dd.pre:
This option allows you to set how your project's glossaries are built. There are four possibilities:
(a) "mixed": existing glossary files (e.g., 00lib/akk.glo) are merged with new glossary data (e.g., from 00lib/akk.new) when you run the harvest-merge sequence prior to rebuilding a project.
(b) "dynamic": your project's glossaries are created anew from your lemmatised ATF files every time you rebuild your project.
(c) "static": the only way to change your project's glossaries is to edit them by hand.
(d) "none": your project has no glossaries.
Tick this box if you want time periods to be displayed in your glossaries. Leave it unticked if you have a single-period project.
